channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI)

item.title: CVE-2017-8676|2024-08-05T16:41:24.414Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20graphics%20device%20interface%20%28gdi%29
item.description: The Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI) in Microsoft Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703, and Server 2016; Office 2007 SP3; Office 2010 SP2; Word Viewer; Office for Mac 2011 and 2016; Skype for Business 2016; Lync 2013 SP1; Lync 2010; Lync 2010 Attendee; and Live Meeting 2007 Add-in and Console allows an authenticated attacker to retrieve information from a targeted system via a specially crafted application, aka "Windows GDI+ Information Disclosure Vulnerability."
